data.actual_result: Circles are not centered with 2 pixels of space on top and 3 pixels of space on bottom
data.expected_result: Circles should be centered in the toggles
data.short_description: On 80 zoom, the circles in the toggles for server notification settings aren't centered
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 80 - Open the notification settings of a random server - Observe the circles in the toggles
